bug.author: SamDehaeck
bug.summary: split of a multidimensional matrix not working as in 2.4
bug.description: Hello, I have a 22x1024x1024 matrix with complex numbers (=> 2Channels). When I perform the splitting function in Opencv 2.4, I get a vector of 2 matrices with 22x1024x1024 elements as expected. When doing the same split in Opencv 3.0, I get 2 matrices of 22x1024 elements with dims =2. Converting the matrix to a 2D matrix with 22x1048576 first and then splitting does give a good result in Opencv 3.0. Best regards, Sam.
